HallOfFame.LogExtensions.BASE_ERROR: Hall of Fame has encountered an unexpected error. Please report the problem to the mod author on Paradox Mods/Forum or via Discord/GitHub (@toverux).
HallOfFame.LogExtensions.RECOVERABLE_ERR: The error is recoverable and you should be able to ignore and continue to play.
HallOfFame.LogExtensions.FATAL_ERROR: The error is fatal and can have unintended side effects, recommend to save and restart the game and disable the mod if this repeats.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[HallOfFame.Ha: When using the Hall of Fame screenshot button, also take a screenshot using the standard basegame mechanism (ex. on Windows, C:\Users\You\AppData\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\Screenshots).
Hostname (not URL) of the hall of fame server. You should not change it unless you're developing on the mod or using an alternative server.
